---
title: "Starter Pack — ₹790 (mock checkout)"
---

This page is a client side mock. It does not charge a card.

<form id="checkout-form" style="max-width:520px">
  <fieldset>
    <legend>Your details</legend>
    <label for="name">Name</label><br>
    <input id="name" name="name" required style="width:100%"><br><br>
    <label for="email">Email</label><br>
    <input id="email" name="email" type="email" required style="width:100%"><br><br>
    <button id="proceed" type="button">Proceed</button>
  </fieldset>
  <div id="step2" style="display:none; margin-top:1rem; padding:0.5rem; border:1px solid #ddd">
    <p><strong>Order</strong>: FlairMI Starter Pack · <strong>₹790</strong></p>
    <button id="complete" type="button">Complete order (mock)</button>
  </div>
  <div id="done" style="display:none; margin-top:1rem; padding:0.5rem; border:1px solid #0a0">
    <p><strong>Order complete</strong> (mock). Download your files below.</p>
    <ul>
      <li><a href="../downloads/FlairMI_Starter_Pack.zip">FlairMI_Starter_Pack.zip</a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</form>

<script>
const form = document.getElementById('checkout-form');
const step2 = document.getElementById('step2');
const done = document.getElementById('done');
document.getElementById('proceed').addEventListener('click', () => {
  if (form.name.checkValidity() && form.email.checkValidity()) {
    step2.style.display = 'block';
    form.name.disabled = true;
    form.email.disabled = true;
  } else {
    form.reportValidity();
  }
});
document.getElementById('complete').addEventListener('click', () => {
  step2.style.display = 'none';
  done.style.display = 'block';
  if (window.console) console.log('mock_purchase', {amount:790, email: form.email.value});
});
</script>
